fields.plant_source_of_coal: Coal is delivered by overland conveyor from Hunter Valley mines, and by rail from Western NSW mines

fields.plant_location: Hunter Valley, approx 145kms north of Sydney, New South Wales, Australia

fields.plant_name: Loy Yang B Coal Power Plant Australia
fields.plant_source_of_coal: Adjacent Loy Yang open cut mine

fields.plant_name: Kwinana ABC Coal Power Plant Australia
fields.plant_location: 32 km S of Perth, Western Australia
fields.plant_source_of_coal: Coal is delivered by train from Collie Coal Mines

fields.plant_name: Worsley Coal Cogen Power Plant Australia
fields.plant_location: Worsley alumina refinery, SW Western Australia

fields.plant_fuel_type_primary: Mixed Fuel (Coal NG, Blast Furnance Gas, Wood Pellets)

fields.plant_name: Porto do Pecem Coal Power Plant Brazil
fields.plant_source_of_coal: Imported (Colombia) Coal. By conveyor from Pecem Port

fields.plant_location: Figueira, Rio do Peixe valley, Parana, Brazil

fields.plant_operating_company: Companhia de Geracao Termica de Energia Eletrica
fields.plant_name: President Medici (Candiota) Coal Power Plant Brazil
fields.plant_location: Candiota, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil
fields.plant_source_of_coal: Candiota Mine operated by Cia Riograndense Mining and transported by conveyor belts with Calorific value 2600-3200 Kcal / Kg

fields.plant_name: St. Jerome (UTSJ) Thermal Power Plant Brazil
fields.plant_location: St. Jerome, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil
fields.plant_source_of_coal: Sao Vicente Mine near Minas do Leao operated by Cia. Riograndense de Mineracao. 3800-4200 Kcal/Kg

fields.plant_source_of_cooling_water: reservoir created in 1954 by a 12 metre high dam located on the Battle River
fields.plant_name: Battle River Coal Generating Station Canada
fields.plant_source_of_coal: Prairie Mines & Royalty Ltd. supplies surface-mined coal from Paintearth and Vesta coal mines located directly south of the station

fields.plant_location: Wabamun Lake, 70 kilometres west of Edmonton, Alberta, Canada
